  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c87b2a-b09c-40d0-294d-2727a0fc97da#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">id. Pieter Bruegel, a realitás szemlélése</string>
            <string language="en">s.r. Pieter Bruegel, approaching reality</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">s.r. Pieter Bruegel, nähernde Wirklichkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">s.r. Pieter Bruegel, réalité d'approche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">s.r. Pieter Bruegel, realidade 
aproximando-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">s.r. Pieter Bruegel, realtà 
d'avvicinamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">S.r. Θ*Πηετερ Bruegel, πραγματικότητα προσέγγισης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">s.r. Pieter Bruegel, realidad que se 
acerca</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Bruegel szellemi és művészi környezete, megrendelői, munkásságának jellege, a kortársak értékelése a festőről</string>
            <string language="en">spiritual and artistic surrounding of Bruegel, his customers, the charater of his activity, appresiation of the contemporaries about the painter</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Manierizmus,  16. Század,  Bruegel,  </string>
            <string language="en">manierism, 16th century, Bruegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geistiges und künstlerisches Umgeben von Bruegel,
seine Kunden, das charater seiner Aktivität, appresiation der 
Zeitgenossen über den Maler</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">entourage spirituel et artistique de Bruegel, ses 
clients, le charater de son activité, appresiation des contemporains 
au sujet du peintre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cercar espiritual e artístico de Bruegel, seus 
clientes, o charater de sua atividade, appresiation dos 
comtemporâneos sobre o pintor</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circondare spiritoso ed artistico di Bruegel, i 
suoi clienti, il charater della sua attività, appresiation dei 
contemporanei circa il pittore</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πνευματικό και καλλιτεχνικό να περιβάλει Bruegel, οι
πελάτες του, το charater της δραστηριότητάς του, appresiation
των συγχρόνων για το ζωγράφο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el rodear espiritual y artístico de Bruegel, sus
clientes, el charater de su actividad, appresiation de los 
contemporáneos sobre el pintor</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">manierism, 16. Jahrhundert, Bruegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">manierism, 16ème siècle, Bruegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">manierism, 1õ século, Bruegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">manierism, sedicesimo secolo, Bruegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">manierism, 16$ος αιώνας, Bruegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">manierism, décimosexto siglo, Bruegel</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
